thread.title: PGA National to revamp sports and racquetball complex
thread.title_full: PGA National to revamp sports and racquetball complex

author: Arlene Satchell
title: PGA National to revamp sports and racquetball complex
text:
PGA National to revamp sports and racquetball complex PGA National Resort & Spa new sports and racquet club interior PGA National Resort & Spa 
An illustration of the renovated interior of PGA National Resort & Spa's revamped Sports & Racquet Club, set to be completed by end of 2015. 
An illustration of the renovated interior of PGA National Resort & Spa's revamped Sports & Racquet Club, set to be completed by end of 2015. (PGA National Resort & Spa) Improvements coming to PGA National Resort & Spa PGA National's health and racquet club is being refinished floor to ceiling 
PGA National Resort & Spa — home of the PGA Tour Honda Classic — has broken ground on its expanded sports and racquet ball club. 8 
The enhanced and expanded sports facility is part of a multimillion-dollar improvement project at the resort in Palm Beach Gardens. 
As part of the overhaul, the resort's former health and racquet club is being refinished and expanded from floor to ceiling, a resort spokeswoman said. 0 
Improvements will include a new entry pavilion and covered walkway, expanded and open tennis pro shop called iFIT, a new saltwater outdoor lap pool and upgraded training rooms and fitness studios. 
The enhancements also include a new 3,000-square-foot off-lobby terrace area called iDECK and its adjacent iBar and an interior redesign and treatment upgrades at The Spa at PGA National. All work is expected to be completed later this year. 
For information, go to pgaresort.com
